welcome_message_body: Welcome to Malate, Philippines! Known for its vibrant nightlife, rich history, and beautiful sunsets along the Manila Bay, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal serves international and domestic flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for Cebu Pacific and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves domestic flights for several airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
